statements: SELECT * FROM user_data;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM user_data ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, email FROM user_data WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT user_id, last_name, address FROM user_data WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM user_data ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, first_name, email FROM user_data WHERE first_name ILIKE '%A%' AND email LIKE '%gmail%' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE address ILIKE '%street%' AND phone_number LIKE '111-%';
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number, address FROM user_data WHERE email NOT LIKE '%yahoo%';
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email, address FROM user_data WHERE last_name ILIKE '%son%' ORDER BY user_id ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, email FROM users;
SELECT id, name FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT id, email FROM users ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE id > 3 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, phone FROM users WHERE name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id BETWEEN 2 AND 5;
SELECT name AS username, email AS user_email FROM users WHERE id = 4;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT full_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT user_id, full_name, email, address FROM users JOIN orders ON users.user_id = orders.user_id ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT full_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT u.full_name, o.total_amount, p.product_name FROM users u INNER JOIN orders o ON u.user_id = o.user_id INNER JOIN products p ON o.order_id = p.product_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_orders > 2;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM users;
SELECT city, state FROM addresses;
SELECT card_number, expiration_date, cvv FROM credit_cards;
SELECT user_id, total_amount FROM purchases;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT u.first_name, u.last_name, a.street_address, a.city FROM users u JOIN addresses a ON u.user_id = a.user_id;
SELECT p.purchase_id, u.first_name, u.last_name, p.purchase_date, p.total_amount FROM users u JOIN purchases p ON u.user_id = p.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, first_name, last_name FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT email, phone_number FROM users WHERE last_name LIKE 'D%';
SELECT * FROM addresses WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM addresses WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY postal_code ASC;
SELECT u.first_name, u.last_name, p.name, p.price FROM users u INNER JOIN orders o ON u.id = o.user_id INNER JOIN products p ON o.id = p.id;
SELECT a.*, u.first_name, u.last_name FROM addresses a INNER JOIN users u ON a.user_id = u.id WHERE a.city = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT o.total_amount, p.name, p.price FROM orders o LEFT JOIN products p ON o.id = p.id WHERE o.total_amount > 100 ORDER BY o.total_amount DESC;
